column4: what's better? gnome or KDE?  I just read an article that has Linus Tovalds recommending KDE, saying it's more efficient.  Is that true?
if anyone wants to read the article, here is the link http://www.oreillynet.com/linux/blog/2006/05/taking_a_linuslike_attitude_to.html
Does anyone know about the /etc/passwd file?  Should it have a user named 'nobody'?
